name: The Doors (Besteres)
description:
For a better experience, download the executable!

Game made in 3 days for SURVIVE Game Jam 2022 https://itch.io/jam/gdsc-1

Progress by finding the next door in each room.
You can die either by being too nervous or getting killed by a creature.

Movement - awd

Jump- SpaceBar

Interact/PickUp- E

Music: Sigmarune and Freesound.org
SFX: Freesound.org and Dr.Pepper SFX
